column6: Reference from the Qur'an (English)
“In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.”
column8: الاسم الأعظم، الذي يدل على الذات الإلهية المعبودة.
column9: The Greatest Name, which indicates the Divine Essence that is worshipped.

column6: “Say, “He is Allah , One”
“Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High”
“Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous”

column4: The One Who Alone Deserves to be Worshiped
column6: “And your god is one God…”

column5: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
column6: “He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.”

column5: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
column6: “He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.”

column5: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
column6: “He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.”

column5: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
column6: “He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.”
“He is Allah , the Creator, the Inventor (originator), the Fashioner…”
“Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent (Most Kind), the Merciful.”
“Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.”

column4: The One Who Accepts the repentance
column6: “Indeed, it is He who is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer (dominant), the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”

column5: فَاللّهُ خَيْرٌ حَافِظًا وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ …
column6: “But Allah is the best guardian…”

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ كَانَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَسِيبًا …
column6: “Indeed, Allah is ever, over all things, an Accountant (Ever-Reckoner).”
“And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian (Preserver).”
“Indeed, He is ever gracious to me (Ever-Hospitable).”
“it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.”
“it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.”

column5: وَهُوَ الْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِ وَهُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْخَبِيرُ
column6: “And He is the subjugator over His servants. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted .”
“Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.”
“indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.”

column5: اللّهُ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
column6: “Allah – there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence…”

column5: اللّهُ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
column6: “Allah – there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence…”
“Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.”
“He is Allah , the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner…”

column4: The Creator Who Creates Again & Again
column6: “Indeed, your Lord – He is the Knowing Creator.”
“and because Allah is Kind and Merciful.”
“In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.”
“In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.”

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
column6: “Indeed, it is Allah who is the Provider, the firm possessor of strength.”
“but when You took me up, You were the Observer over them…”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”
“Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.”
“then indeed, Allah is appreciative (Grateful) and Knowing.”
“Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.”
“and You are, over all things, Witness.”

column4: The Perfect Lord & Master Upon Whom All of the Creation Depends
column6: “Allah , the Eternal Refuge.”
“Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”
“And He is the Most High, the Most Great.”

column4: The One Who Pardons Again & Again
column6: “indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Competent.”
“Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.”
“And He is the Most High (Sublime), the Most Great.”

column5: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
column6: “the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.”
“Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.”
“indeed, Allah is the Free of need (Self Sufficient), the Praiseworthy.”
“And He is the Knowing Judge (Arbiter).”

column5: لْ هُوَ الْقَادِرُ عَلَى أَن يَبْعَثَ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابًا مِّن فَوْقِكُمْ أَوْ مِن تَحْتِ أَرْجُلِكُمْ
column6: “Say, “He is the Able to send upon you affliction from above you or from beneath your feet…”

column5: وَهُوَ الْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِ وَهُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْخَبِيرُ
column6: “And He is the subjugator over His servants. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted .”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”
“indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Competent (All-Powerful).”
“Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.”
“Indeed, it is your Lord who is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.”
“He is Allah , the One, the Prevailing.”
“Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted (supreme).”

column5: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
column6: “O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,”
“Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer (dominant), the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”
“Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted (supreme).”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior (justly proud)…”

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
column6: “Indeed, it is Allah who is the Provider, the firm possessor of strength.”
“Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.”
“Honorable (glorious) Owner of the Throne”
“Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing.”
“He is Allah , the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner (bestower of forms)…”

column5: وَكَانَ اللّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ مُّقْتَدِرً
column6: “And Allah is ever, over all things, Perfect in Ability (Omnipotent).”

column5: وَكَانَ اللّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ مُّقِيتًا
column6: “And ever is Allah , over all things, a Keeper (Supreme Nourisher/overseer).”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”

column5: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
column6: “In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.”

column5: أَنَّ اللّهَ مَوْلاَكُمْ نِعْمَ الْمَوْلَى وَنِعْمَ النَّصِيرُ
column6: “Excellent is the protector (patron/master), and Excellent is the helper.”

column5: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ
column6: “He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer (dominant), the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior…”

column5: أَنَّ اللّهَ مَوْلاَكُمْ نِعْمَ الْمَوْلَى وَنِعْمَ النَّصِيرُ
column6: “Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.”
“He is Allah , the One, the Prevailing.”

column5: وَإنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ الْوَارِثُونَ
column6: “And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.”
“Indeed, Allah is all-Encompassing (all-prevading) and Knowing.”
“my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate (loving).”
“and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs (Trustee).”
“He is the Protector (Guardian), and He gives life to the dead…”
“Indeed, You are the Bestower…”
“Allah is Beautiful (graceful), He loves beauty (grace)…”
“That is because I am the Most Generous, Majestic…”

column5: … إِنَّ اللّهَ هُوَ الْحَكَمُ وَإِلَيْهِ الْحُكْمُ
column6: “Allah is Al-Hakam (the Judge) and judgment is His…”
“Your Lord is munificent and generous…”

column5: أَقْرَبُ مَا يَكُونُ الرَّبُّ مِنَ الْعَبْدِ فِي جَوْفِ اللَّيْلِ الآخِرِ
column6: “The closest that the Lord is to a worshipper is during the last part of the night…”

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ رَفِيقٌ يُحِبُّ الرِّفْقَ فِي الأَمْرِ كُلِّهِ
column6: “Allah is kind (gentle and lenient) and likes that one should be kind (gentle and lenient) in all matters…”
“All Glorious (perfect), All Holy, Lord of the Angels and the Spirit.”
“The lord is Allah, the Blessed and Exalted…

column5: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ أَذْهِبِ الْبَاسَ، اشْفِهِ وَأَنْتَ الشَّافِي
column6: “O Allah, the Lord of the people! Remove the trouble and heal the patient, for You are the Healer…

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ طَيِّبٌ لاَ يَقْبَلُ إِلاَّ طَيِّبًا
column6: “Allah is Good (Pure) and He therefore, accepts only that which is good (pure)…

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ هُوَ الْمُسَعِّرُ الْقَابِضُ الْبَاسِطُ الرَّزَّاقُ
column6: “Indeed Allah is Al-Musa’ir (One who regulates the prices), Al-Qabid (the withholder – the one who seizes), Al-Basit (the expander – the one who grants increase), Ar-Razzaq (the ever providing)…

column5: إِنَّ اللّهَ هُوَ الْمُسَعِّرُ الْقَابِضُ الْبَاسِطُ الرَّزَّاقُ
column6: “Indeed Allah is Al-Musa’ir (One who regulates the prices), Al-Qabid (the withholder – the one who seizes), Al-Basit (the expander – the one who grants increase), Ar-Razzaq (the ever providing)…
“You are the One who make (some people) forward (The One Who Gives Precedence) And (some) backward (The Delayer)…
“You are the One who make (some people) forward (The One Who Gives Precedence) And (some) backward (The Delayer)…

column5: in the hadith of Shadad ibn Au’s in al-Mujam al-Kabir (7:257) it is narrated that the prophet (pbuh) said ‘God is Mohsin so you too bring Husn in your deeds … ‘. Al-Albani considers the hadith to be authentic in his Sahih al-Jami (1824)
column6: A number of the well-known scholars of the past including Ibn Taymiyah (in majmu’a al-fatawa 1:379) and ibn Qayyim (in madarij al-salikin, 1:418) have referred to Mohsin as a name of God.
“Allah is Al-Mu’tee (the Giver) and I am Al-Qasim (i.e. the distributor)…

column5: …لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَكَ الْمَنَّانُ…
column6: “none has the right to be worshiped but You alone, and You have no partner or associate, the Bestower (benefactor)…
“Allah is witr (one) and loves ‘the witr’…
